chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: lattice
s: Pred T
C: sup_closed s
u: Pred tp

Goal:
sub_sup' u \In s

Premises:
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
sub_sup' = fun u : Pred tp => sup [Pred x | exists y : tp, y \In u /\ x = sval y] : Pred tp -> T
sup_closed = fun T : lattice => [Pred s | forall d : Pred_Class, d <=p s -> sup d \In s] : forall T : lattice, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments sup_closed {T}
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp |- Type] ?T' : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp |- Type] ?f : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp |- ?T'] ?s : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp |- seq ?T]
sup_clos_idemp : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> sup_closure s =p s
sup_closure = fun (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) => [Pred p | forall t : Pred T, s <=p t -> t \In sup_closed -> p \In t] : forall T : lattice, Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments sup_closure {T}
sup_clos_min : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> sup_closed t -> sup_closure s <=p t
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
sup_closP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed (sup_closure s)
sup_clos_sub : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), s <=p sup_closure s
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
sub_leq : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T), {x : T | x \In s} -> {x : T | x \In s} -> Prop
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
subPosetMixin : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T), Poset.mixin_of {x : T | x \In s}
Image_mem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (P : Pred A) (x : A), x \In P -> f x \In [Image f i | i <- P]
sub_refl : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}), sub_leq x x
InE : forall T : Type, (forall x y : T, x \In [:: y] <-> x = y) * (forall (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s <-> x = y \/ x \In s) * (forall (T0 : Type) (x : T0) (p : Simpl_Pred T0), (x \In p) = p x)
sub_asym : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y x -> x = y
sub_trans : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y z : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y z -> sub_leq x z
Im_mem : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (a : A), b = f a -> a \In P -> image_spec P f b
Image' : forall A B : Type, Pred A -> (A -> B) -> Pred B
image_spec_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : Prop), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
image_spec_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : SProp), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
Mem_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), x \In s1 ++ s2 < -> x \In s1 \/ x \In s2
PredU = fun (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T) => [Pred x | xPredU p1 p2 x] : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments PredU {T}%type_scope
PredI = fun (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T) => [Pred x | xPredI p1 p2 x] : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments PredI {T}%type_scope
PredD = fun (T : Type) (p1 p2 : Pred T) => [Pred x | xPredD p1 p2 x] : forall T : Type, Pred T -> Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments PredD {T}%type_scope

```coq
unfold sub_sup'. unfold sup. rewrite Mem_map_inv. intros [y [Hy1 Hy2]]. 
rewrite <- Hy2. apply C. exists y. split; auto.
Qed.```

original: unfold sub_sup'. unfold sup. rewrite Mem_map_inv. intros [y [Hy1 Hy2]]. rewrite <- Hy2. apply C. exists y. split; auto.
